dct_description_sm: Christoferus Saxton descripsit ; Augustinus Ryther Anglus sculpsit an° dñi. 1577.
Decorative border and cartouches, coats of arms (royal arms in title cartouche, Seckford arms in lower left), ships, sea monster.
Title in Latin, place names in English.
Appears in Saxton’s An atlas of England and Wales, London, 1579.
